title: [Blood Moon Yasuo] Q: Steel Tempest BUG

replies.body: That doesn't actually hit anyone, does it? If I recall correctly, Yasuo's q animation has a split second wind up to it, hence that little black line.

But why.It is ugly let RIOT delete that
{{item:3070}}

Hiya! 

In the future, please report PBE issues on the [PBE boards](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback), as it helps us better track live issues v. PBE issues. ^-^

As for this, it's working as intended. The particle is mirroring the base, just a different color the better match the skin.

http://imgur.com/4lhCgq6
But in the Blood Moon  Yasuo back Q is so longer line
